channel.title: Blog on Econumo
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on Econumo

item.title: v0.2.3 Econumo release
item.description: Changelog # Disabled a portion of the login form for the custom backend API URL Updated links to the Privacy Policy and Terms of Service pages Added edition to the logo GitHub releases # Econumo One: v0.2.3 Econumo Family: v0.2.3

item.title: v0.2.2 Econumo hotfix
item.description: Changelog # Rollback of the dependency update in composer.lock that broke authentication GitHub releases # Econumo One: v0.2.2 Econumo Family: v0.2.2

item.title: v0.2.1 Econumo release
item.description: Changelog # Added functionality to connect registered users with one another automatically. GitHub releases # Econumo Family: v0.2.1

item.title: v0.2.0 Econumo release
item.description: Changelog # Removed the legacy PostgreSQL dependency. Added an X-Timezone header to each API request to maintain consistent time zones between the frontend and backend. Addressed all of Rector’s warnings. Removed the old analytics API. Update API documentation. GitHub releases # Econumo One: v0.2.0 Econumo Family: v0.2.0

item.title: v0.1.0 Econumo release
item.description: The first public release of Econumo. GitHub releases # Econumo One: v0.1.0 Econumo Family: v0.1.0
